@sarcoidfilm Dr‚Äôs are taught about sarcoidosis  in about half a chapter of their immunology text! And he‚Äôll it‚Äôs a pulmonary condition, which is beaten into their heads.   We neuro‚Äôs get treated, following the treatment protocols set for pulmonary, same meds etc. üôÑ.

@sarcoidfilm I was told I couldn‚Äôt have neurosarcoidosis, it‚Äôs a lung condition üò≥ he caught me on the wrong side of being a redhead! I told him as sweet as possible ‚Äútake your diploma out of your ass, read my file that path says differently via biopsy of 3.5cm lesion!‚Äù
